text: Motion
Motion
Motion

It's okay.
Amana-chan, Tenka-chan...
We're heading there with Producer-san now.

Thank you for letting me know promptly,
Thanks to you, I can bring it in time.
Yeah... yeah.
In that case, shall we meet at the north exit?

If we leave now,
We should arrive at around the same time.
Phew...

Chiyuki!
I brought this... Is this okay?

I think it should be fine...
But let me double-check just in case!

Yes, this is the document...
Thank you, this really helped...
If we take the next train, we should make it perfectly on time.

Oh, you also checked the transfer for me.
Thank you...

Well, who would have thought there would be a paper
bag that looks so similar there... It's easy to mistake, right?

It seemed like a delivery left by the
vendor while Hazuki-san was out...

Hehe,
timing can be tricky sometimes.

We managed to cover it up like this,
So I guess it's no problem.
Let's go, Producer-san.

Amana-chan and the others must be restless
until they receive the documents...

There's still a bit of time until the train arrives.
Shall we wait in the waiting room?
Huh, Chiyuki...?

I'm sorry,
I was buying pastries and tea at the shop.

Oh, it's lunchtime, after all...
Sorry for not noticing.

No, it's not for me,
It's for Amana-chan and Tenka-chan.

Indeed, if you're worried and waiting,
you might forget about food entirely.
Yes, that's right♪
But still...

Please take a good look at the bread bag,
Producer-san.

Hmm...?
What is it...?
This is lunch for both of them!

...I wouldn't eat this much
all by myself...!
Ah...

Yeah.
Sorry, Chiyuki...
Hehe...

After lessons,
There are times when I eat this much, though.

Ah...
The train's here.

Time flies when I'm talking with you,
Producer-san...

I feel the same, Chiyuki.
It's surprisingly quick.

...I'm happy.
Thank you very much.
Alright, let's go, Producer-san!
